item.description:
Hi Donna,

Thank you for helping me get the word out regarding our event.  Steve mentioned you could put our information out on the Worcester Photography webpage.

The link is:

http://www.umassmed.edu/cancerwalk

Every year we are very grateful for the photographers who donate their time to us for the Cancer Walk.

Our event this year is on Sunday, September 23rd – registration begins at 8:00 and the walk itself starts at 10:00 a.m.  If possible we’d like folks to get there for 7:30 and if some want to come mid-way to catch the end of the event with the returning walkers that would be great as well.

If you or anyone else has questions, they can contact me directly at :  508-856-1318 or via e-mail at:  denise.mandeville@umassmed.edu

Thank you so much for your support!

Denise

Denise Mandeville

Project Assistant II

UMass Medicine Cancer Walk

UMass Medicine Development Office

333 South Street

Shrewsbury, MA  01545

508-856-1318

Denise.Mandeville@umassmed.edu

http://www.umassmed.edu/cancerwalk

14th Annual UMass Medicine Cancer Walk

Sunday, September 23, 2012

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: UMass Cancer Walk looking for Photographers to Volenteer to Document the day
